title: Show HN: Covid-19 Projections, Simple Logistic and Exponential Models
description: Hello, HN! There have been a lot of COVID-19 from various sites, but a common complaint is that simple things like log-scaling population counts are are infrequently done. So I decided to do it: https://covid19.fernandes.org/ I've aggregated the JHU (per Coun…
content:
